name: Dream (itch) (bogdandumitrascu)
description:
You are stuck in a dream. Everything looks familiar yet strange at the same time. How can you end this ? Everybody knows that if you die in a dream you wake up but can you find a way to do it ?

Controls

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Q - Push

This game was made as part of the weekly game jam by a team of two.

Contact

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bogdan-dumitrascu/
